channel.title: Pages on Thomas Ruiz Blog
channel.description: Recent content in Pages on Thomas Ruiz Blog

item.title: About me
item.description: Welcome to my blog! My name is Thomas Ruiz and I’m a french technical lead working at Neoxia. I work on a lot of technologies and has some knowledge I want to share with others. I will talk about microservices, cloud computing, frontend and backend development, and some other things that I’m interested in. If you want to contact me, you can find me on my erratic twitter @thsruiz. I hope you like and dislike what I have to say, I’d love to know your thoughts about my posts.
